subject: Re: [junit] Order of the testXXX() methods
msgSnippet: Yes. Read the JUnit FAQ or google Test Infected to see how to build a test suite by hand . ... J. B. Rainsberger, President, Diaspar Software Services Let s
messageBody:
Yes. Read the JUnit FAQ or google "Test Infected" to see how to build a test suite "by hand".

>So said chakib.gherbi@... on 4/14/2003
>--------------------
>I'm using Junit's suite() method to create through the reflection mechanism
>a test suite containing all the testXXX() methods.
>I realized that depending on the platform I'm using the order in which
>these
>methods are run is different.
>
>Is there a way to force the test suite to always run these methods in the
>same order.
>
>Cheers,
>Chakib
>
>
>
>
>[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
